name: places/ChIJyXb2feJYwokRjcJj0Wh5C2Y
formattedAddress: 321 E 48th St, New York, NY 10017, USA
adrFormatAddress: 321 E 48th St, New York, NY 10017-1749, USA

originalText.text:
As a person who has been in therapy with all kinds of doctors for years, Dr. Rivamonte is the only one I’ve found who takes my insurance and consistently helps with my depression and ADHD

She has helped me figure out how to communicate with my boyfriend, proven to me time and again that my life isn’t a failure and I’m not crazy, she helps me work out things I don’t like about myself in a nonjudgmental way, and I recommend her to all of my friends who are looking for a therapist.

She always responds quickly to my messages, is a real, intelligent, unpretentious human being, and frequently makes time to talk to me at the last minute. I’ve personally seen her do this for her other clients as well.

She’s a lifesaver. Really.

originalText.text: SHAME OF PROFESSIONALISM !... DO NOT TRUST ...! Biggest mistake of my life....She told all my secrets & mistakes to my wife, PLS BE AWARE!.. She violated Doctor-Patient Confidential and made my life hell!...
